document_data.Description: ''Dungeon Master's Guide II'' provides more advice and threats for running games, adventures, and campaigns; a detailed city (Saltmarsh); new features for non-player characters; and master–student relationships, business rules, and teamwork rules for new rules for player-characters. There are also guidelines for creating prestige classes and organizations, and more features for magical items.
